EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Spring Days Atlanta Social_Q317.2017 Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering for the Spring Days Atlanta Social
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Spring Days Atlanta Social on July 18th at The Pig and the Pearl. We look forward to seeing you there after the first day of Spring Days Atlanta <[[https://www.springdays.io/ehome/spring-days/atlanta]]>.
Date: Tuesday, July 18, 2017
Time:
5:15PM to 7:15PM
Location: The Pig and the Pearl 1380 Atlantic Drive NW Atlanta, GA 30363 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/The+Pig+and+The+Pearl/@33.7933654,-84.3999153,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x88f504f825cd6115:0xee41f413b2811fb1!8m2!3d33.793361!4d-84.3977213]]>)
<[[https://www.springdays.io/ehome/spring-days/atlanta]]>
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email Tasha Isenberg at tisenberg@pivotal.io <[[mailto:tisenberg@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team Event Details <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/Spring-Days-Atlanta-Social.html]]>
